name: Burger Quest
description:
Burger Quest is a short RPG game where you try to find money to buy a burger.

There are 7 different endings. The game auto saves after each ending.

Burger Quest is compatible with the original DMG, Game Boy Color, and Super Game Boy. Just place the ROM on a flash cart or your emulator machine of choice and start playing. You can also play here on the web page using your PC or phone or download the .pocket file to play on an Analogue Pocket. I don't have an Analogue Pocket though so I have no idea how you go about using the file.

I made the game in a handful of days as a way to get back into making games.

D-Pad to move

A to interact with things and select menu options

B to cancel menus

Start to check your money and fish

Select to mute the "music"
